articles.author: Carmen Paun
articles.title: WHO names likely source of ‘mystery disease’ in the Congo - POLITICO
articles.description: A combination of viral respiratory infections, malaria and malnutrition has killed nearly 50 people in the African country.
articles.content: Why it matters: An increase in deaths in the western DRC area of Panzi triggered an alert among national and global health authorities earlier this month that a potentially unknown pathogen may be si… [+1136 chars]
